column5: and went home to be with the lord on june 12
column8: and grandmother. she devoted her life to raising and nurturing her children and grandchildren
column9: and was loved by all. she was a member of canaan baptist church
column10: bessemer. ethel is preceded in death by her husband woodrow wilson carter; sons rex alan carter and larry ray carter; and 6 brothers and sisters. she is survived by her children donald woodrow carter (judy)
column13: and richard d. carter; 16 grandchildren; 29 great grandchildren; and 12 great-great grandchildren. the visitation will be monday
column15: 2015 from 11:30 am until 1:00 pm at peoples chapel funeral home. the funeral service will be at 1:00 pm at the funeral home
column16: with rev. morgan bailey officiating. burial will follow at cedar hill cemetery.
